import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './homepage.component.scss' import { animate, motion } from "framer-motion" import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; // import {useSpring, animated} from 'react-spring' import ClusterMessage from '../../components/clusterMessage/clusterMessage.component' import Benefit from '../../components/benefit/benefit.component' import Vopsele from '../../components/Vopsele/vopsele.component' import Newsletter from '../../components/Newsletter/newsletter.component' import Parteneri from '../../components/Parteneri/parteneri.component' import Contact from '../../components/Contact/contact.component' import Seap from '../../components/Seap/seap.component' import Footer from '../../components/Footer/footer.component' import livrare from '../../assets/livrare.png' import retur from '../../assets/retur.png' import plata from '../../assets/plata.png' import consiliere from '../../assets/consiliere.png' // import TriangleLogo from '../../assets/triangle.svg' import {ReactComponent as TriangleLogo} from '../../assets/triangle.svg' export default function HomePage() { const vopsele = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 100 }, actual: { opacity: 1, y: 0 } } const [ref, inView] = useInView({ threshold: 0, }) console.log(ref) console.log(inView) return (
{/* */}
{ inView ? : null }
) }
